content: repeat from * to eor 35 round 10 *ssk k2tog repeat from * to eor 35 using mcrnd 5 *k1 sl1wyib repeat from * to eor using mcrnd 11 *k1 sl1wyif repeat from * to eor round 6 ssk k2tog ssk x 8 k1 18 round 12 ssk k2tog ssk x 8 k1 18 all sizes finishing when final round of crown shaping has been worked cut a 12 /30 cm tail thread through a tapestry needle then thread needle through live stitches and pull tight to close top weave in ends gently block and enjoy © 2025 susan gressman for personal use only all rights reserved branchlet page 4
